authors: Rinaldo C, Moncada A, Gradi A, Ciuffini L, D'Eliseo D, Siepi F, Prodosmo A, Giorgi A, Pierantoni GM, Trapasso F, Guarguaglini G, Bartolazzi A, Cundari E, Schininà ME, Fusco A, Soddu S. 2012.
title: HIPK2 controls cytokinesis and prevents tetraploidization by phosphorylating histone H2B at the midbody.
